content:
from the designer this baby blanket pattern is good for beginners it starts with a foundationless double_crochet gauge doesn t matter and you can use any type of yarn and whichever hook you like
the pattern is basically groups of two double_crochet s with a single double_crochet at the beginning and end of the row the single double_crochet s will be used in the border round
i used a g hook and one 6-ounce skein of sport-weight red heart soft baby in bunny print i made mine about 19 x 23 to fit a car seat or baby carrier
